abstract: Television and Internet distributors like DirecTV and EarthLink said Comcast’s acquisition of NBC Universal would harm competition. But for the most part, big media companies — like Time Warner, News Corporation and The Walt Disney Company — were silent about the proposed combination of Comcast’s cable distribution and NBC Universal’s cable and broadcast channels.

lead_paragraph: Opponents of Comcast’s bid to control NBC Universal lined up on Monday evening, the deadline set for public comments to the Federal Communications Commission.

headline.main: In Comcast-NBC Deal, Local Stations Request Conditions
